munchkin_id.title: Munchkin ID token
munchkin_id.description: The first part of Identity. Can be found in Admin > Web Services menu in the REST API section

desired_fields.title: Desired Fields
desired_fields.description: Write down the column names you want to extract and separate them by comma. Relevant only to Leads endpoint. Must contain id column as it is the primary key.

dayspan_created.title: How many days back you want to go with 'Created'?

dayspan_updated.title: How many days back you want to go with 'Updated'?

desired_activities.title: Desired Activities
desired_activities.description: Use only for Activities endpoint. Write down the IDs of activities you want to extract and separate them by comma. Note: The “Delete Lead” activity is not supported.

month/year_created.title: Month/Year for 'Created'
month/year_created.description: Alternative to the following field (if both are filled, the following field is used). You can specify a month/year in format MMM YYYY, e.g. Oct 2018.

month/year_updated.title: Month/Year for 'Updated'
month/year_updated.description: Alternative to the following field (if both are filled, the following field is used). You can specify a month/year in format MMM YYYY, e.g. Oct 2018.  Valid only for leads endpoint.
